get-most-recent-broadcaster-type-for-str: SELECT value FROM broadcaster_type WHERE streamer_id={streamer_id} ORDER BY date_scraped DESC LIMIT 1;
get-streamer-ids-with-no-followers-data-: SELECT streamer_id FROM streamers WHERE streamer_id NOT IN (SELECT streamer_id FROM followers);
get-streamer-ids-that-dont-have-follower: SELECT streamer_id FROM followers GROUP BY streamer_id HAVING MAX(date_scraped) < {date} ORDER BY MAX(date_scraped) ASC;
